verses.roman:
ei-mata stuti kare premāviṣṭa hañā
tīre nṛtya kare kuṇḍa-līlā saṅariyā

synonyms: ei-mata—in this way; stuti kare—offers prayers; prema-āviṣṭa—overwhelmed by ecstatic love; hañā—becoming; tīre—on the bank; nṛtya kare—dances; kuṇḍa-līlā—pastimes of Rādhā-kuṇḍa; saṅariyā—remembering.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu thus offered prayers to Rādhā-kuṇḍa. Overwhelmed by ecstatic love, He danced on the bank, remembering the pastimes Lord Kṛṣṇa performed on the bank of Rādhā-kuṇḍa.
